trans-unit.source: Describes the status of a binding.
## XAML Text Usage You do not typically use this enumeration in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ## Использование XAML текст вы обычно не использовать это перечисление в [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The binding has been successfully activated.

This means that the binding has been attached to its binding target (target) property and has located the binding source (source), resolved the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Path" name="Path" href=""></xref> and/or <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""></xref>, and begun transferring values.
trans-unit.target: Это означает, что привязка был присоединена к свойству привязки (цели) и нашла источник привязки (источник), устранения <xref uid="langword_csharp_Path" name="Path" href=""> </xref> и/или <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""> </xref>и начала передачу значений.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The binding is waiting for an asynchronous operation to complete.
To be added.
The binding has been detached from its target property.
trans-unit.target: Привязка была отсоединена от свойства целевого объекта.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The binding has not been activated.
To be added.
The binding was unable to resolve the source path.
trans-unit.target: Привязке не удалось разрешить путь источника.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The binding has not yet been attached to its target property.
trans-unit.target: Привязка еще не присоединена к своему целевому свойству.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The binding was unable to send the value to the source property.
trans-unit.target: Привязке не удалось отправить значение свойству source.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The binding could not successfully return a source value to update the target value.
trans-unit.target: Привязке не удалось вернуть исходное значение для обновления целевого значения.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks on <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе примечаний на <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
